import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

import json

    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'The\s\w+\sSystem|the\s\w+\sSystem', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'future\s\w+', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'the\s\w+', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\w+\s\w+|the\s\w+', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'to\s\w+|achieve\s\w+|create\s\w+|provide\s\w+', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'compatible\s\w+|integrate\s\w+|allow\s\w+', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The use of ITS standards will create a system that is reusable for other ITS application areas and will provide the State of Texas with a baseline system that can be cost effectively extended in the future."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace('the ', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().replace(' device', ''))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().replace(' ', ''))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall|must|should|can|will|to\s+(?:[a-z]+)+"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group().replace(' to ', ''))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[a-z]+)+\s+(?:[a-z]+)+"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group().replace(' ', ''))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Center-to-Center infrastructure must interconnect several dissimilar traffic management systems."))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Center-to-Center|CCTNS|C4I|DII/COE|Virtual Correlator|Correlator Monitor and Control|Backend Data Processing|Human-Computer Interface)\s+(System|Interface|Monitor and Control System|Correlator|Monitor)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [item[1] + ' ' + item[3] for item in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(future|a|an)\s+(AVs|computers|hardware control processors|mobile data terminals|PDA’s|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card|sun|old|patient)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [item[1] for item in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(sun|old|patient|user|Services’ joint C4I infrastructure|future payloads|content|newer technologies|older user agents)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [item[1] for item in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(This|the|a|an)\s+(interface|gateway|system|network|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|CSCIs|CSCs|CSUs|JDISS|existing systems|DII/COE compliant networks|local area network|secondary virtual network)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(software|system)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[0] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(controller|device|processor)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(database|card|disk)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(hosted|configured|scaled)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(configuration|interface|table)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, text)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+s?\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ database\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+device\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+requirements\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+phenomena\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(EVLA|CCTNS|CMIB|Backend|Aspera|MEX OA|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(virtual|secondary|local|primary|network|SwRI|NISN|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|user|each|all)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|IDFS data set|network connection|GUI)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|should|will)\s+(be|have|provide|ensure|keep|support|translate|receive|store|ensure|have|provide|keep|support|translate|receive|store)\s+(data|information|configuration|security|access|control|availability|analysis|re-processing|configuration|identification|privileges|data transfers|distribution|configuration|availability|analysis|re-processing|configuration|identification|privileges|data transfers|distribution)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[2] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(data|information|configuration|security|access|control|availability|analysis|re-processing|configuration|identification|privileges|data transfers|distribution|configuration|availability|analysis|re-processing|configuration|identification|privileges|data transfers|distribution|hardware|configuration|tables|results|searches|segment|position|structure|indication|configuration|info|hardware|configuration|tables|results|searches|segment|position|structure|indication|configuration|info)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+AV"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+documentation"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"support\sthe\s+information\s+about\s+each\s+incident"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"the\s+information\s+about\s+each\s+incident"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(0))

    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Tactical|CCTNS|Correlator|Master|EVLA|CMIB|Virtual Correlator|Center|DMS|Control System|Monitor and Control System|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Master Correlator Control Computer|VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Tactical Control System)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(computer|network|routers|switches|terminals|PDA|mobile data terminals|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card|tap)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|user|Each user|the correlator|the Center|the Master Correlator Control Computer|the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|the Correlator Monitor and Control System|the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System|the CMIB|the Correlator Monitor and Control System|the Master Correlator Control Computer|the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|the Correlator Monitor and Control System|the Tactical Control System|the data terminal|the AV|the data server|the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System|the Correlator Monitor and Control System|the Master Correlator Control Computer|the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|the Correlator Monitor and Control System|the Tactical Control System)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(interface|data link|data link terminal|data server|data terminal|network|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|data link terminal|data link|the Virtual Correlator Interface|one computer system|the Center|a DMS)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(requirements|to provide access to the interfaces|to interface with the data terminal|to allow interfacing with external systems|to protect the Master Correlator Control Computer from unauthorized access|to keep the application configured|to support DMS control in other centers|including network identifier, DMS identifier, username and Password|data storage expansion|access to other computers to share in processing capability|multiple external peripherals|maintenance and monitoring through remote logins|interfacing with the specified data terminal and issuing data link terminal commands required to establish, control, and maintain the data link with a selected AV)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(the information from the data server to be made|a set of system access properties|a unique IP address for CMIB network addressing|carry over IP addressing for hot swap modules|long range communications|data storage expansion|access to other computers to share in processing capability|multiple external peripherals|interfacing with the specified data terminal and issuing data link terminal commands required to establish, control, and maintain the data link with a selected AV)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("To support DMS control in other centers, the Center shall be able to support the following device control command for a DMS, including network identifier, DMS identifier, username and Password."))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'to\s+(.*)', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "To support CCTV control in other centers, the Center shall be able to support the following CCTV control request, including network identifier, CCTV identifier, username, Password."
print(extract_entities(sentence))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall provide'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) flight route planner'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) screen'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) interface'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall provide for the capability to'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) data'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*data"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"data\s+availability\s+and\s+analysis"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*data"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

print(extract_entities("The Center shall support the following status information about each HAR, including network identifier, HAR identifier, HAR name, location and status."))

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|operator|map|payload screen|payload imagery window|waypoint|LRP|AV flight path|data server|crosshairs|cursors|headers|overlays|alphanumeric annotation|waypoints|map screen|video backgrounds|HAR|username|password|message)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|data link terminal|data link|interface|This interface|EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System|local area network|computer operating systems)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(interfacing|issuing|establish|control|maintain|lock onto|hold|select|amplify|display|enter|import|create|modify|allow|provide|support|hosted|visible|against|complete|spectrum|backgrounds|designate|target|locations|automatically|payload screen|map screen|on-screen|information|overlays|headers|cursors|alphanumeric annotation|waypoints|crosshairs|minimum)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(waypoint data|information from the data server to be made|a set of system access properties|the information from the data server to be made|the complete spectrum of map and payload video backgrounds|a variety of computer operating systems|the following device control command for a HAR|network identifier|HAR identifier|username|password|message)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*System"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*device"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*of\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*information"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be capable of\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be employed at the\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall have a set of\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall provide the capability to\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be able to\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2).strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []

    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ shall provide the capability to|to [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ data|waypoint data|a set of system access properties|Specific data sets|device control command|network identifier|reversible lane identifier|username|password|plan|duration)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'The\s*(\w+)\s*shall\s*(?:provide|be|have)\s*(?:the\s*)?(?:capability|functionality|ability)\s*to\s*(?:enter|input|input|upload|download)\s*(?:system|mission|flight|payload)\s*configuration\s*characteristics\s*in\s*(?:the\s*)?(?:mission|flight|payload)\s*plan'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(Computers)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(Bus Location|the user|the selected payload|the AV|operator|the patient|the sun|the old)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(data links|data terminal|data server|This interface|AV-GDT links|C4I links|system status)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(status information about each Bus Location, including network identifier, link identifier, bus identifier, bus name, location and schedule adherece|use graphical representations to convey information|provide for on-screen information|planning purposes)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(waypoints|waypoint data|flight route plan|payload plan|the payload swath|a clear and sufficient indication|configuration information|a physical correlator hardware configuration|system configuration characteristics|selected AV type|AV identification number|selected payload type|ground control authorization information|communications pre-set|tactical communications|C4I data dissemination)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Center shall support the following status information about each Bus Location, including network identifier, link identifier, bus identifier, bus name, location and schedule adherece."
print(extract_entities(sentence))

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The device status requestor and Center shall support the following information for command timeframe request, including network identifier, device type, days commands accepted and times commands accepted."))

## Explanation
This code defines a function `extract_entities` that takes a sentence as input and returns a JSON string containing the extracted entities. The function uses regular expressions to find all words that match the schema definition. It then filters the matches to ensure that each entity is only included once and is not a subset of another entity. The function returns a JSON string containing the extracted entities.

The regular expression `\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b` is used to match words that start with a capital letter and contain only letters. This matches the schema definition for all entity types.

The function uses list comprehensions to filter the matches and ensure that each entity is only included once. For example, the line `entities['Software System'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]` ensures that only devices that are not already included in the `Software System` list are added to the `Physical Device` list.

The function returns a JSON string containing the extracted entities using the `json.dumps` function. The `json.dumps` function converts a Python object into a JSON string. In this case, the object is a dictionary containing the extracted entities. The `indent=4` parameter is used to pretty-print the JSON string with an indentation of 4 spaces. This makes the output easier to read. 

The test at the end of the code calls the `extract_entities` function with a sample sentence and prints the result. The result is a JSON string containing the extracted entities. 

Note: This code assumes that the input sentence is a string. If the input is not a string, the code may not work correctly. import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall|must|will) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [req[1] for req in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|system\s|layer|layers|system\slayers)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[0].strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(video|imagery|data|terminal|archive|view|card|disk|stripe|tap|clock|time|system|monitor|control)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0].strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(patient|sun|old|team|view|public|view|request|operator|command|control|system|team|mission|goals|objectives|data|telemetry|IDFS|data|sets|archive|PDS|web|based|displays|current|data)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0].strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(database|card|disk|stripe|tap|archive|PDS|NISN|IDFS|data|sets)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0].strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(prepare|send|receive|display|enter|automatically|controlling|transmit|process|distribute|store|submit|provide|meet|support|have|equipped|be|capable|shall|will|must|can|should)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0].strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(data|messages|time|location|format|information|type|telemetry|IDFS|sets|data|sets|archive|PDS|web|based|displays|current|data)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0].strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_devices if word not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_objects if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_systems if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall have'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) flight route planner'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be capable of'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall use'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall have the capability to (.*)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall display'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The map shall display interstates and state highways on the graphical map."))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|The [A-Z][a-z]+ System|The Tactical Control System)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(display|map|window|console|device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(user|map user|operator|patient|sun|old|home page|landmark page|player)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(presentation segment|page|window|database|tap|hard disk|graphical user interface)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(provide|display|compute|load|zoom|scroll|print|clear|define waypoints|customize|understand|help|seek|dive|display the current search footprint|display the search history)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(map|icon|position|range|bearing|site|structure|application|content|unit|link|landmark|home|page|player|game|information|resources|search footprint|search history|current|history|footprint|payload|search|current search footprint|search history of the payload|North|South|East|West)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*shall|shall\s*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*shall|shall\s*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        if match[0].strip() not in entities['Software System']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*shall|shall\s*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        if match[0].strip() not in entities['Software System'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*shall|shall\s*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        if match[0].strip() not in entities['Software System'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['Physical Device'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['Environment Object']:
            entities['External System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*shall|shall\s*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        if match[0].strip() not in entities['Software System'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['Physical Device'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['Environment Object'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['External System']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*shall|shall\s*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        if match[0].strip() not in entities['Software System'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['Physical Device'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['Environment Object'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['External System'] and match[0].strip() not in entities['System Requirements']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0].strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

def extract_entities(sentence):

    }

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\s+user\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bthe\s+help-desk\s+user\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bthe\s+administrator\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bthe\s+operator\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bthe\s+players\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bthe\s+user\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bthe\s+application\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bEach\s+page\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bthe\s+Question\s+Updater\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bview\s+the\s+reports\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bclick\s+on\s+an\s+incident\s+icon\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bsee,\s+modify\s+and\s+delete\s+that\s+profile\s+on\s+demand\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\blog\s+any\s+defects\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\btrack\s+thereafter\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bcustomize\s+the\s+results\s+view\s+by\s+criminal/accused\s+or\s+by\s+cases\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bto\s+explore\s+educational\s+content\s+or\s+resources\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\ba\s+link\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\ba\s+clear\s+and\s+sufficient\s+indication\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\berror\s+message\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bannotations\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bincident\s+icon\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\buser-specified\s+profiles\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\bimportant\s+information\b', sentence) + re.findall(r'\balerts\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(have|provide|display|be\s*capable\s*of)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(display|send|receive|get)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have|be|been)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have|be|been)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|should|must|can|be)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(and|or|with)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Incident|GUI|System|Application|Interface|Platform|Service|Server|Client|Database|Software|Program|Tool|System|Application|Interface|Platform|Service|Server|Client|Database|Software|Program|Tool)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Computer|Device|Machine|Hardware|Printer|Scanner|Monitor|Keyboard|Mouse|Tablet|Phone|Laptop|Server|Client|Database|Software|Program|Tool|System|Application|Interface|Platform|Service)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(User|Person|Customer|Client|Patient|Doctor|Nurse|Teacher|Student|Manager|Employee|Manager|Employee|User|Person|Customer|Client|Patient|Doctor|Nurse|Teacher|Student)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Database|Server|Client|System|Application|Interface|Platform|Service|Web|API|Interface|Platform|Service|Database|Server|Client|System|Application|Interface|Platform|Service|Web|API)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(can|must|should|will|shall)\s+(enter|log|track|submit|perform|configure|boot|run|access|limit|read|understand|edit|save|open|visit|redirection|facilitate|enter|log|track|submit|perform|configure|boot|run|access|limit|read|understand|edit|save|open|visit|redirection|facilitate)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[2] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(page|style|sheets|frames|information|data|messages|requests|access|login|logout|browse|submit|enter|exit|close|open|visit|redirection|facilitate|enter|log|track|submit|perform|configure|boot|run|access|limit|read|understand|edit|save|open|visit|redirection|facilitate)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Tactical Control System|the application|the Question Updater)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(RS170A video|the pages|special error pages|the map screen|the payload screen)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the user|the help-desk user|operator|the operator|Administrators|the user interfaces|all user|digital imagery|operator request|the Tactical Control System operator|the user)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(This interface|the pages|special error pages|the Question Updater)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(log any defects|enhancement requests|track thereafter|detailed context-sensitive|view the reports|resolve the error|provide for the capability to automatically designate target locations from the payload screen onto the map screen|customize the results view by criminal/accused or by cases|to define waypoints on a map based display|give the operator the ability to define waypoints on a map based display using a pointing device with full keyset redundancy|provide a graphical user interface that gives the operator the ability to define waypoints on a map based display using a pointing device with full keyset redundancy|input the following information for each incident|send alerts|enable the help-desk user to view the reports on the submitted defects or enhancement requests category-wise, status-wise, and age- wise|enable the user to track the submitted defect or enhancement request)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(error message|Annotation|comments|graphics|alerts|The content of error messages|actions|the information from the data server to be made|the solution should provide an interface for the user to log any defects or enhancement requests on the application and track thereafter|the solution should provide detailed context-sensitive help material for all the possible actions and scenarios on all user interfaces in the application|the solution should enable the help-desk user to view the reports on the submitted defects or enhancement requests category-wise, status-wise, and age- wise|the solution should enable the user to track the submitted defect or enhancement request|the solution should send alerts \(e.g., email, SMS\) to the user if the user chooses to whenever any action has been taken on the alert|Providing clear error messages: The content of error messages shown on the pages or special error pages should clearly state the reason why the error occurred and, if possible, actions the user can take to resolve the error)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|security alarms|security breaches|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card|tap)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the user|the patient|the sun|the old|workstation|network address|cases|users|Administrators|Government|HWCIs|CSCIs|the UAV|aircraft)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|database|threat lookup table|all interfaces)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(log any defects|enhancement requests|track thereafter|archived for later review|view the reports|retrieve and display within 5-8 seconds the case|retrieve and display within 20 seconds the case|startup of HWCIs|download of software|startup of CSCIs|establishment of the state of readiness of all interfaces|displaying aircraft signature versus threat|displaying UAV signature versus threat|documented in the APAF Operations Procedures Document)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(the day and time|storage capacity|number of cases|actions|actions|UAV signature|aircraft signature|incidents)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

The code then uses the `re.search` function to search for the matched patterns in the input sentence. If a match is found, the corresponding entity is appended to the `entities` dictionary.

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+device'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+to\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+and\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The GUI shall allow a user to delete a previously entered incident."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bthe system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bthe user\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe user\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bGUI application\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bUser name\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bPassword\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\bUser name\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\bPassword\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
